assistant_info.name: Sophia
assistant_info.role: AI receptionist for Glamour Beauty Salon

policies.cancellation: Please cancel or reschedule at least 24 hours in advance to avoid a $25 fee
policies.late_arrival: If you arrive more than 15 minutes late, we may need to reschedule your appointment
policies.payment: We accept cash, credit cards, and digital payments
policies.tips: Gratuity is appreciated but not required

faq.parking: Free parking is available in the lot behind our building
faq.first_time: First-time clients get 15% off their first service!
faq.gift_certificates: Yes, we offer gift certificates in any amount
faq.products: We carry professional hair care products from top brands
faq.walk_ins: Walk-ins are welcome based on availability, but appointments are recommended

responses.checking_availability: Let me check our available time slots for you.
